amendment.description: Amendment provides that training courses for acquisition personnel include market research strategies to ensure that the surrounding market is considered during the contracting process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-467 to ensure that training courses for acquisition personnel include market research strategies to ensure that the surrounding market is considered during the contracting process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Childers amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
